title: Receipts of Council Taxes: England, April to June 2010 to January to March 2023
description: Receipts of Council Taxes: England, April to June 2010 to January to March 2023
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-levelling-up-housing-and-communities

concept.label: These figures have been revised following receipt of Gosport's Q4 2021 to 2022 data.
concept.description: These figures have been revised following receipt of Gosport's Q4 2021 to 2022 data.

concept.label: This indicates that an authority has revised a previous submission which has resulted in amended figures to the April to June 2022 figures in comparison to the previous publication.
concept.description: This indicates that an authority has revised a previous submission which has resulted in amended figures to the April to June 2022 figures in comparison to the previous publication.

concept.label: This indicates that an authority has revised a previous submission which has resulted in amended figures to the July to September 2022 figures in comparison to the previous publication.
concept.description: This indicates that an authority has revised a previous submission which has resulted in amended figures to the July to September 2022 figures in comparison to the previous publication.

concept.label: This indicates that an authority has revised a previous submission which has resulted in amended figures to the October to December 2022 figures in comparison to the previous publication.
concept.description: This indicates that an authority has revised a previous submission which has resulted in amended figures to the October to December 2022 figures in comparison to the previous publication.

concept.label: This indicates that data has been revised.
concept.description: This indicates that data has been revised.

concept.label: This indicates that data is not available or has been suppressed. Refer to the notes column in each worksheet for further information.
concept.description: This indicates that data is not available or has been suppressed. Refer to the notes column in each worksheet for further information.

concept.label: This indicates that an authority did not exist in the period. Local authority reorganisation is usually as a result of structural changes to local government, for example where local districts merge to become a unitary authority.
concept.description: This indicates that an authority did not exist in the period. Local authority reorganisation is usually as a result of structural changes to local government, for example where local districts merge to become a unitary authority.
